In England, in the seven days to 21 August, there were 186,537 new confirmed cases (329.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 14 August, there were 174,641 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (11,896 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 26 August is 5,764,066 (10,192.8 cases per 100,000 population).
